alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 8:01PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River Near Town Bluff Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday evening at 815 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River near Town Bluff. * WHEN...From Monday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 70.0 feet, Flooding can be expected around Barlow Lake and Brushy Lake with some roads being cutoff and some of the lowest properties near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 67.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight into early tomorrow morning and continue rising to 69.4 feet early Tuesday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
